metadata.name: Descendens lunae
metadata.description:
Descending of the moon is a piece based on an impression I had in mind, 
As an unholy incident, a tragic act of cruelty and
A sin... 
demonstrating a death scene 
The moment of suffering that's about to perish... 
Awakened by greed, 
His soul is leaving the wretched flesh, 
A gentle touch out of regret, 
The unforgivable guilt has been accrued...

The process of the creating was simply influenced by great master Caravaggio
I tried to imitate his way of creating in my own way
So I consider this artwork as a genuine tribute to him...
